price: Enyi mlio kufuru! Msilete udhuru leo. Hakika mnalipwa mliyo kuwa mkiyatenda.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Wataambiwa makafiri Siku ya Kiyama: Msitafute udhuru leo! Hapana shaka mnalipwa mliyo kuwa mkiyatenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
